CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1965, pg. 23, reads: "HERO TO THE KIDS - Willie Mays, the super star of the San Francisco Giants, is still the big hero to the kids wherever the West Coast club appears. Last week at Pittsburgh's Forbes Field, Mays took time out to talk baseball to the three youngsters shown above, who are (left to right) Osvaldo Virgil, son of the Pirates' Ossie Virgil; Mike and Ken Ruffner. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: San Francisco Giants baseball player Willie Mays showing baseball bat to Osvaldo Virgil, Mike Ruffner, and Ken Ruffner, in stands at Forbes Field, Oakland
